attributes.action: Mr Clarke should report to the commons on his return for the Bilderberg group meeting.
attributes.additional_details:
Petition to the Mr Clarke

Mr Kenneth Clarke
House of Commons
London
Date June 2nd 2012


Dear Mr Clarke

I understand that you, as the Lord Chancellor and Secretary of Justice was one of the participants at the Bilderberg meeting, Thursday, May 31 at Chantilly, Virginia, USA at the Marriott Hotel until June 3.

If you, as a Minister of the Crown as been at this meeting with members of foreign governments, press reports and companies, I would like to see you report back to the House of Commons on your return.


Your Sincerely

Ian Summerell
The Zider Party
